title: Ryder Cup 2014: Putters in Play
headline: Putters in Play at the 2014 Ryder Cup
description: Check out the putters all 24 Ryder Cuppers wielded during the 2014 Ryder Cup at Gleneagles, including each player's world ranking and strokes gained putting stats on the PGA Tour.
short_headline: Putters in Play at the 2014 Ryder Cup
slug: Putters in Play at the 2014 Ryder Cup
body: Check out the putters all 24 Ryder Cuppers wielded during the 2014 Ryder Cup at Gleneagles, including each player's world ranking and strokes gained putting stats on the PGA Tour.
